title: WHEN THE KING SHALL CLAIM HIS OWN
author: E. J. Hopkins

verses.text:
Long-er should that was the harvest, Sev-'ring each the precious wheat from the weeds, Then the saints shall bright appear;
At the judgment seat of Christ, When the King, the righteous Judge, shall sep-a-rate the chaff from those with blessed harvest.
